ActivityMetadata.Name: GH List team members Legacy
ActivityMetadata.Label: GH List team members Legacy
ActivityMetadata.Description:
**Deprecation Notice:** This endpoint route is deprecated and will be removed from the Teams API. We recommend migrating your existing code to use the new [`List team members`](https://developer.github.com/v3/teams/members/#list-team-members) endpoint.
Team members will include the members of child teams.
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Github

List team members (Legacy)

**Deprecation Notice:** This endpoint route is deprecated and will be removed from the Teams API. We recommend migrating your existing code to use the new [`List team members`](https://developer.github.com/v3/teams/members/#list-team-members) endpoint. Team members will include the members of child teams.

Method: Get

OperationID: teams/list-members-legacy

EndPoint:

/teams/{team_id}/members
